0213BFD24D1F5098BAF59088EA8C47A6: Allows AIs to follow a path connected with multiple nodes when the AIs are not in combat. Currently both Guard and Wildlife are supported.
BEB829D3461B507DE56489AB7CD84EDD: Allows AIs to follow a path connected with multiple nodes when the AIs are not in combat. Currently both Guard and Wildlife are supported.
FE45B5C54822076FAE387FA24960AD98: Allows AIs to follow a path connected with multiple nodes when the AIs are not in combat. Currently both Guard and Wildlife are supported.
0356E581418B10908DDDACB8E31397BA: Assign the instigator When Receiving From
14ADC5094FFB0F23A5AF9EAC4C8BF25E: Go To Next Patrol Group When Receiving From
14EAE0A942974B8FEF8BBE98D912E75F: Transmit a signal on the selected channel when any AI starts patrolling this Patrol Path.
EB5F83A34EE47765D9A4268CC4F40FE2: Transmit a signal on the selected channel when the next Patrol Path Node is unreachable.
B315C0F244F831281CDB57A39C275135: Transmit a signal on the selected channel when the patrolling AI reaches this Patrol Path Node.
9456AFE641FFFBC5D3D10B8FF3AF0A12: Transmit a signal on the selected channel when the patrolling AI stops using the Patrol Path.
DF997B5B4F5CB15A43574EA6E565D3AE: When Next Node Is Unreachable Transmit On
9AA6CD8A4943DB83B2FED88FE49C7C3D: When Patrol Path Started Transmit On
B926212C40479CB9BFA9C38CC9C343F7: When Patrol Path Stopped Transmit On
B41F8B3B4A94BF7E6BB94EA21C625AF3: Will assign the AI instigator to this patrol path.
6D946BBA44F5B8D493DE1CB23147F2D5: Will send the AI instigator to the Next Patrol Group when receiving a signal from the selected channel. This option works with When Node Reached or When Next Node Is Unreachable.

UserOptionDefinition.AIPatrolPath_Device_C.Patrolling Mode.De: Determines how the AIs should patrol the associated Patrol Path. Back and Forth, AI will keep moving along the path from the start node to the end node and then go back reversely; Looping, AI will keep moving from the start node to the end node and then go back directly to the start node; Stop at End, AI will stop at the end node.
UserOptionDefinition.AIPatrolPath_Device_C.PatrolPathPointInd: Our index in the PatrolPathIndex grouping (which is different from the Patrol Path Group)
UserOptionDefinition.AIPatrolPath_Device_C.Next Patrol Path G: Sets the Patrol Path Group for the AI instigator to go to when Go To Next Patrol Group is received.
Sets the Patrol Path Group that this device belongs to.
UserOptionDefinition.AIPatrolPath_Device_C.PatrolPathIndex.De: Used to connect PatrolPath Devices to each other.
UserOptionDefinition.AIPatrolPath_Device_C.Patrol Path Orderi:
Used to order the Patrol Path in its Patrol Path Group.
NO ORDER will put the Patrol Path at the end.
If multiple Patrol Paths have the same order, they will be randomly ordered between themselves.
UserOptionDefinition.AIPatrolPath_Device_C.On Next Node Unrea: When next Patrol Path Node is unreachable.
UserOptionDefinition.AIPatrolPath_Device_C.On Node Reached.De: When the AI reaches the current Patrol Path Node.
UserOptionDefinition.AIPatrolPath_Device_C.On Patrol Path Sta: When the AI starts using the Patrol Path.
UserOptionDefinition.AIPatrolPath_Device_C.On Patrol Path Sto: When the AI stops using the Patrol Path.
UserOptionDefinition.AIPatrolPath_Device_C.Enabled At Start.D: Whether the device will be enabled on game start or not.
UserOptionDefinition.AIPatrolPath_Device_C.Show Path In Edit: Whether to display the Patrol Path in Edit Mode or not.
UserOptionDefinition.AIPatrolPath_Device_C.Show Path In Play: Whether to display the Patrol Path in Play Mode or not. (This only works for playing your own island in Creative, it won't show in published islands)
Will assign the AI to this patrol path.
UserOptionDefinition.AIPatrolPath_Device_C.Go To Next Patrol:
Will send the AI instigator to the Next Patrol Group. 
This option works with When Patrol Path Node Reached or When Next Patrol Path Node Is Unreachable.

Will send the AI instigator to the Next Patrol Path in the Patrol Group. 
This option works with When Patrol Path Node Reached or When Next Patrol Path Node Is Unreachable.
